name: Roller Rink
overview: Gone are the days of romantic hand holding and round-the-rink roller skating. You are now the lead skater in a national Roller Derby team called the Fire Wheels. And your team has survived to the finals. Of course, the opposing Players have abandoned ali thoughts of sportsmanship. Be prepared. Be ready to win. Skinned knees! Broken noses! And sprained ankles! Compare this Roller Derby game to a hockey Match: plan to get hurt. Your team, The Fire Wheels, wants fiercely to win this roller skating tournament. But so do your do your opponents. Watch their every move! They will be coming at you from every direction. Go faster! and faster! Go around the rink. Don't let any one of them touch you.
